properties.areaDesc: Lawrence, IL; Crawford, IL; Knox, IN; Sullivan, IN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 25 at 11:44AM EST until January 29 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Indianapolis IN
properties.description:
...A Flood Warning continues for portions of the following waterways
in Indiana...

Wabash River...White River...


.Minor flooding continues in west central and southwest Indiana on
the Wabash and White Rivers.

Flooding on the White River, which is now confined to Petersburg,
southward, will end early this coming week.  Along the Wabash,
flooding is expected to last as long as Thursday, January 30.
Another weather system is due by the end of the month.  Is is too
early to tell if this will have an effect on area waterways.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Wabash River at Riverton.
* until Wednesday evening.
* At 11:00 AM Saturday the stage was 19.1 feet.
* Flood stage is 15.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...It will continue to fall to below flood stage by
Wednesday morning.
* At 18.5 feet...High water surrounds elevated river cabins.  County
roads to these cabins are impassable.  Agricultural flooding is in
progress.  Seep water develops behind levees.
properties.instruction:
Precautionary/Preparedness Actions...

Motorists should never drive into flood water. Turn around and go
another way. Keep children away from flooded areas. Recreational and
agricultural interests should remain alert to changing river
conditions.

For detailed flood information go to weather.gov/ind on the web and
click on rivers and lakes.
